social.title: My Social Media
social.description: I’d appreciate it if you’d follow me. Thank you!
social.twitter: Follow my latest news and announcements on Twitter.
social.telegram: Join my Telegram channel for quick updates.
social.facebook: Stay connected with me on Facebook.
social.instagram: Follow my visual journey on Instagram.
social.discord: Join my Discord server and chat with others.
social.twitch: Watch my live streams on Twitch.
social.tiktok: Watch my short videos on TikTok.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: We’re available for questions, feedback, or collaboration opportunities. Let us know how we can help!
